raw_text: HARINDRAN – COLONEL RAMALINGAM – Rtd. SL Army. (Past Provincial Grand Master of Sri Lanka),​ Beloved son of late Parameswari and Ponnambalam Ramalingam of Nallur. Cherished brother of late Mrs. Padmini Jebaranarajah (UK) and of Mrs. Uma Nallainayagam,​ Mrs. Shantha Sivapragasam and Mr. Sundaresan (all of Canada). Loving uncle of late Janarthanan and of Meera,​ Ratheeshan,​ Nayani,​ Channika and Jeevan. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour at 3.30 p.m. on Monday 11th September for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 5 p.m. (old crematorium) with military honours.057507
